name: Find the ground
description:
How to play:

  1. Use the keys [A], [D], and [Right arrow], [Left arrow] to move the player right and left.
  2. Press [Jump] to jump.
  3. To paint a web between platforms, press on one platform and drag it to the other platform. The player can then move and jump on the web.
  4. The objective of the game is to find the ground. However, be prepared for a surprise - there is no ground! Explore and have fun, but be careful not to fall.
  5. If you get stuck or want to restart the game, you can use the key R to go back to the last save point.

Enjoy the game!
